examples:
PUT /new/post Host: example.com Content-Type: text/markdown # My first blog post! I made this through `example.com`'s API. I hope it worked. HTTP/1.1 201 Created Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 Content-Location: /my-first-blog-post ✅ Success!

HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Content-Location: /my-receipts/38 (Lots of HTML…)

You sent $38.00 to ExampleUser.
